title: Take Another Little Piece of My Heart: A Groupie Grows Up
description: Picking up where I'm With the Band left off, the world's most well-known groupie discusses life off the road--marriage to a rock star, motherhood, and of course, plenty of celebrity shenanigans. 35,000 first printing. $35,000 ad/promo. Tour.
author: Pamela Des Barres
